name: Last Call (Natascha2, Sk8terboii, d4star)
description:
You had a fight, now you only have one call to make it right again.

But it's better than leaving without a chance to say sorry. Right?

Last Call was made in a 4 day Game Jam organized by students at ZHdK.  The setting and mechanic we worked with was 'Underwater' and 'Dating Simulator'.  

Found a bug? Congrats, it's yours now :) Take good care of it <3 

Art by

Natascha

Kristy

Code & Sound by

Noe
